title: Do consumers buy into carbon claims? - Footprint
summary: The article explores the growing use of carbon neutral claims by companies, particularly in the food industry. title: Plastic Recycling Industry at Crossroads: Uncertainty and Shrinking Demand Shifts - RecyclingPortal
